payout.title: Payout Settings
payout.limit_desc: You will be paid only after your unpaid balance will reach {{value}}.
payout.gas_limit_desc: Your transaction fee gas price would be limited to {{value}} {{valueUnit}} ({{valueTicker}}, {{percent}} of payout limit). You will not receive any payouts if gas price is higher.
payout.gas_limit_zero: Your transaction fee will not be limited.
